tool_description: CraftMyPDF lets you design PDF templates in any browser with a drag-and-drop editor and generate pixel-perfect PDF documents from reusable templates and JSON data.
name: CraftMyPDF PDF Generation
title: CraftMyPDF PDF Generation

api_list.name: create-merge
api_list.description: This endpoint creates a PDF file from multiple templates. It merges all the PDFs into one.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://craftmypdf-pdf-generation.p.rapidapi.com/create-merge"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "craftmypdf-pdf-generation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: create
api_list.description: This endpoint creates a PDF file with JSON data and your template
api_list.code:

url = "https://craftmypdf-pdf-generation.p.rapidapi.com/create"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "craftmypdf-pdf-generation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: create-async
api_list.description:
This endpoint creates a PDF file asynchronously with JSON data and your template.
The API returns immediately and once the PDF document is generated, it will make a HTTP/HTTPS GET to your URL(will retry for 3 times before giving up)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://craftmypdf-pdf-generation.p.rapidapi.com/create-async"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "craftmypdf-pdf-generation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: create-editor-session
